// Deep Stone Crypt
// -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

// Opening the Crypt
// -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
// This is really a precursor to the main encounters. You will see mostly void
// shields, so something that can strip the shields is helpful. There really
// isn't a requirement here as long as you can clear ads, which include Vandals,
// Captains and even Brigs.

// Encounter 1: Crypt Security
// -----------------------------------------------------------------------------


// Encounter 2: Atraks-1
// -----------------------------------------------------------------------------


// Space Walk
// -----------------------------------------------------------------------------


// Encounter 3: Taniks Part 1

// Garden of Salvation
// -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

// Encounter 1: Evade the Consecrated Mind
// -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
// This encounter is very flexible in your choice of weapons. There are a lot of
// void shields, so best to take something that can rip through those shields as
// quickly as possible. Also, for the current season, anything with Anti-Barrier
// rounds will help with the hobgoblins.



// Encounter 2: Summon the Consecrated Mind
// -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
// The key here is quickly killing your ads, so something for quick.



// Encounter 3: Defeat the Consecrated Mind
// -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

// Izanagi's Burden (with completed catalyst)
dimwishlist:item=3211806999&perks=1070100196,3661387068,3142289711,1168162263,3465198467



// Encounter 4: Defeat the Sanctified Mind
// -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

// Izanagi's Burden (with completed catalyst)
dimwishlist:item=3211806999&perks=1070100196,3661387068,3142289711,1168162263,3465198467

// Last Wish
// -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

// Vault of Glass
// -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
